page.title: 13Health in Bognor Regis
page.content: The {War Memorial Hospital} is the only hospital in Bognor Regis.It provides 26 in-patient beds mainly for geriatric people. Many remain in hospital for 6 to 9 years receivinh intense rheumatical treatment. A { {casualty unit}is open from Monday to Friday. The hospital gives out 14000 treatments a year. There is an X-Ray dept.,occupational therapy, chiropodist,blood clinic and a physiotherapy dept.500 patients are seen each week. If surgery is needed patients go to St.Richards Hospital at Chichester. There are around 33 G.P.'s in the area. There are various voluntary organisations e.g. Samaritans etc. A health Centre is situated in Bognor and a further one is planned in North Bersted.
